text: kaho, "aakaashon aur dharatee mein jo kuchh hai kisaka hai?" kah do, "allaah hee ka hai." usane dayaaluta ko apane oopar anivaary kar diya hai. nishchay hee vah tumhen qiyaamat ke din ikattha karega, isamen koee sandeh nahin hai. jin logon ne apane-aapako ghaate mein daala hai, vahee hai jo eemaan nahin laate
